title: Summer Holidays
description: Summer Holidays (A gay romance 20,000+ words)Dean, a young boy, lives alone with his mother. He has been living a very sheltered lifestyle and doesn't have any friends. One day he notices that there are strange people in his neighbor's front yard. Dean is drawn to the blond hair boy that is there and goes over to meet him.Seth, a University student, is sent to stay with his uncle for the summer holidays. He hates having to go to the country area and believes that this might just turn out to be a complete nightmare for him. When a younger boy approaches him at his uncle's place on the day of his arrival, he begins to think that things might actually turn out to be quite interesting instead.Seth forms a friendship with Dean and they soon begin to develop romantic feelings for each other. Seth has to make important decisions for summer will not last forever.
author: Darina Smith
